snippet: The new Israeli ambassador, Danny Danon, also condemned the Palestinian leadership for what he called its instigation of violence against Jews.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and RICK GLADSTONE

abstract: Danny Danon, new Israeli ambassador to United Nations, rejects Palestinians' demands for international protection force for holy site known as Joseph's Tomb in West Bank; is Danon's first public diplomatic engagement since assuming post; Danon criticizes Palestinian leaders for instigating violence against Jews.
lead_paragraph: The new Israeli ambassador, Danny Danon, also condemned the Palestinian leadership for what he called its instigation of violence against Jews.

headline.print_headline: Israeli Envoy Rejects Plan for a Holy Site
headline.main: Israel’s New U.N. Envoy Rejects International Force at Holy Site
